title: How bad was Nebraska’s offense in 2023?
text:
Nebraska’s offense in 2023 was not good. How bad was it, really?
It’s no secret that Nebraska struggled to find good consistent play on offense. Combine that with injuries to key players on offense and a revolving door at the quarterback position, Nebraska failed to score at least 20 points in eight games.
